sec.title: Acknowledgement
sec.p: We would like to thank the presenters and contributors to the workshop and the AfCEM planners for their efforts and dedication to high-quality emergency care.

sec.title: Dissemination of results
sec.p: Contents from this workshop were shared via a virtual conference platform. Access to the presentations are available via www.youtube.com/channel/UCWI9gGRsJaUwmklmKYSirNQ.
